def process(A, B):
    fibo = [1, 2]
    while A > fibo[0]:
        s = fibo[0] + fibo[1]
        fibo[0] = fibo[1]
        fibo[1] = s
    C = 0
    while B > fibo[0]:
        s = fibo[0] + fibo[1]
        fibo[0] = fibo[1]
        fibo[1] = s
        C += 1
    return C

def main():
    while True:
        A, B = map(int, raw_input().split())
        if not (A or B): break
        print process(A, B)

main()
